name: Fallin' (Found4K)
description:
You are stuck in space. You need to try to get out!! Collect Credit Cards and Emeralds to get out!! 

Currently, there are only 4 levels!! More coming soon!

Controls

Left Arrow - Left

Right Arrow - Right

Space - Jump

Credits

Found4k - Programmer And Designer

GDevelop - Game Engine

Levels
  • Boxes
  • The vents
  • Blood Cubes
  • #FLAPPYBIRD STYLE
Supported Devices

HTML5 (Windows, OSX, Linux)

Zip (WINDOWS)
